metadata.title: Bamboo Sunglasses - 100% Polarized Wood Shades for Men & Women from the"50/50" Collection
features: HANDMADE WOOD SUNGLASSES – The 50/50 line of sunglasses from 4EST come in five fantastic styles. The frames are handcrafted and the arms are made from real wood, making each pair truly unique!

SUPERIOR CRAFTSMANSHIP – The “One size fits most” wood sunglasses look stylish on both men and women. The stainless steel double spring hinges on these wooden sunglasses withstand everyday wear and tear.

UV 400 POLARIZED LENS – Protect your eyes and reduce glare with these sunglasses. Every pair of 4EST 50/50 wood sunglasses comes equipped with UV 400 Polarized Lenses for the highest level of protection against harmful sunlight.
BONUS CASE AND CLOTH – Every order includes a nifty bamboo travel case with the 4EST logo etched into it. You’ll also receive a Microfiber cleaning cloth to keep your lenses clean and clear.
2 TREES PLANTED WITH EVERY PURCHASE – Rest easy knowing that you are also helping the environment when you order a pair of wood frame sunglasses from 4EST. Two trees are planted with every purchase!
description: Sunglasses Handmade from Bamboo & Made For You Upgrade Your Sight & Your Style -Great detail and care put in to ensure our newest “50/50” shades stand out. -2 Tree’s Planted with every purchase! -Polarized lens’s - UV400 lens block 100% harmful UVA & UVB Rays. -Restore true color and vision while eliminating reflected light to protect eyes perfectly -Stainless Steel double spring hinges for universal fit; Built to bend not break. -A timeless wayfarer style A Step Above All sunglasses from 4EST shades are handmade from natural resources to stand out, as well as be eco conscious. The “50/50” collection is new twist on a timeless design. At our fans request for a ray ban style, we have designed some of our best new custom sunglasses. Polarized lenses wrapped in a plastic frame with bamboo arms, these are built to look amazing. An ageless design with a bamboo twist, putting comfort first in style that fits men and women. On top of that we are committed to planting two trees with every purchase of sunglasses. No 4EST purchase would be complete without our standard packaging of a cloth drawstring pouch, Bamboo carrying case and newly included Microfiber cleaning cloth. We at 4EST Shades have been doing everything we can to bring to market great sunglasses. Our goal is to ensure quality and customer satisfaction over everything! Stand Out from the Crowd! Not only will you look good, they are a serious conversation starter! -Protect your eyes in style! out customers love the fit, feel and knowing they are protecting their eyes. -The perfect unique gift!Amazon buyers love & trust 4EST Shades sunglasses to provide quality products with great customer care. So of course all products from 4EST are backed by a 90-day money back guarantee. Limited Supply, Add to cart while supplies last!
